text:
谁受到影响？: 只是我自己
告诉我们您的问题与什么有关。 访问/登录
Select the application: ServiceNow - Mobile App
问题的性质是什么？: 应用程序启动，但我无法登录
请提供更多详细信息，以便我们快速解决您的问题。 :
Authenticator失效，请帮忙处理
设备iPhone13
trans:
Who is affected? Only myself.
What is your issue related to: Access/Login
Select the application: ServiceNow - Mobile App
What is the nature of the issue: The app launches, but I can't log in.
Please provide more details so we can resolve your issue quickly:
The authenticator is not working, please help.
Device: iPhone 13
